programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: Three Weddings and a Funeral: Part 1

programme.title: A Vida é Bela
programme.desc: Guido, um empregado judeu, casa-se com Dora, uma professora que esteve prometida a um fascista. Mas, em 1945, Guido, o tio e o filho são presos e enviados para um campo de concentração. Guido usa a imaginação para tornar o trágico ambiente onde o filho está inserido num mágico país das maravilhas.

programme.title: Mamã
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira tenta sustentar-se a si e ao filho, de 15 anos, que sofre de Perturbação de Hiperatividade e Défice de Atenção. Quando a nova e peculiar vizinha se oferece para a ajudar, encontram um novo sentido de equilíbrio e esperança.

programme.title: Lucky
programme.desc: A viagem espiritual de um ateu de 90 anos e as personagens peculiares que habitam na sua cidade, no meio do nada. Tendo sobrevivido aos seus contemporâneos, o tempestuoso e independente Lucky inicia uma jornada de autoexploração, rumo à iluminação.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Cliente de Risco
programme.desc: Mick Haller, um advogado criminal de Los Angeles, usa o seu carro como escritório. A rotina de trabalho passa por atender clientes e defender pequenas causas, até que surge o grande desafio da sua carreira: defender um playboy de Beverly Hills, que foi acusado de violação e tentativa de homicídio.

programme.title: Um Perfeito Estranho
programme.desc: Quando a jornalista Rowena Price descobre que o homicídio da sua amiga pode estar relacionado com o poderoso executivo Harrison Hill, infiltra-se numa grande companhia publicitária com o intuito de o desmascarar.

programme.title: Operação Especial
programme.desc: Na Nigéria, no seguimento de um golpe de Estado, um grupo de soldados de elite americanos escoltam na selva uma médica e aldeãos ameaçados pelos rebeldes.

programme.title: A Desaparecida, o Aleijado e os Trogloditas
programme.desc: O xerife Franklin Hunt junta um grupo de homens para tentar resgatar uma jovem sequestrada. Mas o que ele não imagina é que os seus inimigos são canibais, que vivem à margem da civilização e vão transformar o resgate numa missão de sobrevivência.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Uma história de amor que se desdobra em múltiplas linhas temporais, ao longo de 500 anos. As personagens conhecem-se, separam-se e voltam a reunir-se de uma vida para a próxima. As ações e escolhas individuais têm consequências e impactos entre si no passado, presente e futuro.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Uma história de amor que se desdobra em múltiplas linhas temporais, ao longo de 500 anos. As personagens conhecem-se, separam-se e voltam a reunir-se de uma vida para a próxima. As ações e escolhas individuais têm consequências e impactos entre si no passado, presente e futuro.

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: Um Dia Perfeito
programme.desc: Uma equipa de ajuda humanitária tenta resolver uma crise numa zona onde decorre um conflito armado. Humor, drama, emoção, rotina, perigo e esperança: tudo cabe num dia perfeito.

programme.title: A Barbearia 3: O Próximo Corte
programme.desc: Quando o ambiente no bairro da Barbearia do Calvin se torna cada vez pior, à medida que os dias passam, a fiel clientela junta-se para mudar a vizinhança para melhor.

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: Passado em 1996, e inspirado em eventos reais, o último filme do provocador Gaspar Noé atira-nos para a loucura malévola que envolve um grupo de dançarinos após uma taça de sangria ser misturada com LSD.

programme.title: Scary Movie - Um Susto de Filme
programme.desc: Depois do homicídio de uma jovem, um grupo de adolescentes começa a suspeitar que há um assassino entre eles. Os jovens têm de se proteger do perigo e de um serial killer mascarado que os aterroriza... Uma áspera comédia que não deixa um único filme de terror, comédia ou ação por satirizar.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Ex_Machina
programme.desc: Caleb, um jovem programador da maior empresa de Internet do mundo, participa numa experiência estranha e fascinante. Ele deverá interagir com a primeira inteligência artificial do mundo, incorporada no corpo de uma bonita rapariga robótica.

programme.title: O Primeiro Encontro
programme.desc: Quando 12 naves espaciais aterram em vários pontos do globo, a especialista em linguística Louise Banks é integrada numa equipa de elite. Com a guerra em "stand by", cabe a Louise tentar comunicar com os alienígenas. Ela espera resolver o mistério, mas pode colocar em risco a própria Humanidade.

programme.title: Realizar o Impossível
programme.desc: Quando, aos 15 anos, Jay descobre que as míticas ondas gigantes da Califórnia, as Mavericks, são reais e existem a poucos quilómetros de sua casa, pede ajuda à lenda local Frosty Hesson. Os dois embarcam numa busca para realizar o impossível, forjando uma amizade única que transforma as suas vidas.

programme.title: Ender's Game - O Jogo Final
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, o jovem Ender Wiggin é recrutado para liderar a luta contra os Formics, uma raça alienígena hostil. Esta quase acabou com a vida humana durante a sua primeira invasão ao planeta Terra...

programme.title: Dá e Leva
programme.desc: Daniel Lugo, Adrian Doorbal e Paul Doyle são três personal trainers de Miami. Em comum, o trio tem o facto de se sentir insatisfeito com a vida que leva. Os três decidem raptar Victor Kershaw, um dos mais ricos empresários da cidade, mas o sonho não corre como planeado...

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

I hope they will come back to bring the show to its former status."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Castle
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in the West

programme.title: Investigação Criminal
programme.sub-title: A Man Walks Into a Bar..

programme.title: Mestres da Ilusão 2
programme.desc: Um ano após os eventos relatados no primeiro filme, em que arrebataram o público ao mesmo tempo que conseguiram enganar o FBI, os Quatro Cavaleiros regressam aos palcos.

programme.title: O Herói de Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Desmond Doss foi o único soldado americano que, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, lutou na frente de batalha sem estar armado, acreditando que matar era errado. Como médico do Exército, evacuou, sozinho, os feridos que tinham ficado em território inimigo.

programme.title: Cidade Dividida
programme.desc: Desconfiado de que a sua esposa lhe é infiel, Nicholas Hostetler, o popular presidente da Câmara de Nova Iorque, decide recorrer aos serviços de Billy Taggart, um ex-polícia caído em desgraça e que agora ganha a vida como detetive particular.

programme.title: Mãos de Pedra
programme.desc: Um filme biográfico sobre o pugilista Robert Durán, que segue a sua ascensão desde as ruas do Panamá até aos grandes triunfos do mundo do boxe.

programme.title: Ouro
programme.desc: A história verídica de Kenny Wells, um explorador desesperado por descobrir ouro e enriquecer, que forma equipa com um geólogo tão ambicioso quanto ele. Wells inicia então uma fantástica viagem em busca de ouro, nas profundezas da selva indonésia.

programme.title: Estado Livre de Jones
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Newton Knight, um agricultor sulista, e da sua rebelião armada contra a Confederação em plena Guerra Civil. Unindo esforços, Knight despoletou uma revolta que levou o Condado Jones a tornar-se independente.

programme.title: A Rapariga No Comboio
programme.desc: Rachel fantasia com a vida aparentemente perfeita de um casal, que vive do outro lado da linha do comboio que apanha diariamente. Quando, da janela, observa algo que a perturba, vê-se envolvida na investigação de uma pessoa desaparecida...

programme.title: A Decisão Mortal
programme.desc: Anna e Tom querem começar uma família, mas vivem dificuldades económicas. Até ao dia em que descobrem o seu inquilino morto e um saco cheio de dinheiro em casa dele. Ao guardar segredo e ficar com o dinheiro, o casal torna-se um alvo a abater.

programme.title: Martin e Lewis
programme.desc: A história da relação conturbada de 10 anos entre Dean Martin e Jerry Lewis.

programme.title: Collide - A Alta Velocidade
programme.desc: Depois de um assalto correr mal, Casey Stein é obrigado a fugir de um gangue cruel, que tudo fará para recuperar os seus bens valiosos. Sem opções e para proteger a namorada, Casey envolve-se numa louca perseguição pelas autoestradas de Munique.

programme.title: Jogo Limpo
programme.desc: A agente Valerie Plame descobre que o Iraque não possui um programa de armas nucleares. O marido, Joe, é enviado para África a fim de investigar rumores da comercialização de urânio. Ao descobrir que tais negócios nunca existiram, Joe escreve um artigo que despoleta uma tempestade de controvérsia.

programme.title: Engana-me Que Eu Gosto
programme.desc: Danny, solteiro e um cirurgião plástico bem-sucedido, usa um estratagema de engate muito pouco convencional: diz que é casado, evitando assim envolvimentos mais profundos. Isto até se apaixonar por Palmer. No entanto, infelizmente, a rapariga julga que ele é casado.

programme.title: Morangos com Açúcar - O Filme
programme.desc: Margarida e Rui, depois de estudarem em Inglaterra, regressam a Portugal para um acampamento de férias, onde reencontram amigos de outros tempos. Aproveitam também para participar num Festival de Verão. Missy M, a Tatiana mete-se no meio do casalinho e vive uma aventura romântica com Rui.

programme.title: Soldado Destino
programme.desc: Antes de John McCain ser candidato à presidência dos EUA, pilotou bombardeiros no Vietname. Após o seu avião ser atingido, torna-se recluso na célebre prisão conhecida como Hanoi Hilton. Durante anos, ele passa por um inferno, mas não lhe conseguem roubar a sua honra, a nenhum custo.

programme.title: Dinheiro Quente
programme.desc: Seth Davis desistiu da faculdade, mas, para tentar viver à altura dos padrões de exigência do pai, arranja emprego como corretor numa empresa de investimento e começa rapidamente a ter sucesso. Só que nesse emprego nem tudo é tão legal como parece.

programme.title: Aposta de Solteiros
programme.desc: Sete amigos fazem uma aposta: o que se casar por último leva todo o dinheiro. Um deles apaixona-se de facto pela rapariga que contratou para isco.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: O Sorriso das Estrelas
programme.desc: Numa estalagem, uma mãe de família, que se encontra em processo de divórcio, e um cirurgião, que acaba de sofrer, também ele, um grande trauma, apaixonam-se.

programme.title: O Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Numa cidade, prestes a festejar o seu centenário, os habitantes tornam-se vítimas de espetros assassinos que escondem um segredo inquietante.

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: Um pulso inteligente de eletricidade move-se de casa em casa. Aterroriza os ocupantes, assumindo o controlo dos aparelhos, matando-os ou fazendo-os destruir a casa.

programme.title: Uns Pais do Pior
programme.desc: Frank e Nancy levam a sua única filha à faculdade e quando regressam a casa, num bairro da classe alta, constatam que as suas poupanças diminuem rapidamente. Recorrem então a medidas extremas para esconder a sua situação e manter as aparências...

programme.title: Combate Mortal 2
programme.desc: O governador do Espaço Exterior envia um grupo de Exterminadores à conquista da Terra, onde um conjunto de guerreiros tenta impedir os seus planos.

programme.title: Parasitas
programme.desc: Ki-taek tem uma família unida, mas estão todos desempregados e sem perspetivas. O filho Ki-woo é recomendado para dar explicações bem pagas na casa dos Park, o que vem desencadear a esperança de um rendimento e provocar uma série de incidentes.

programme.title: Depois da Terra
programme.desc: Uma aterragem forçada deixa o adolescente Kitai Raige e o seu lendário pai, Cypher, presos na Terra, mil anos depois da Humanidade ter escapado a eventos cataclísmicos. Com Cypher gravemente ferido, Kitai embarca numa perigosa viagem para pedir ajuda.

programme.title: Antes de Adormecer
programme.desc: Christine acorda todos os dias sem memória do seu passado, depois de um acidente traumático. Por seu lado, o marido apresenta-se e explica-lhe a vida que têm em conjunto. No entanto, quando ela questiona aquilo que lhe é dito, novas verdades emergem e tudo parece suspeito.

programme.title: Payback - A Vingança
programme.desc: O assalto foi fácil e o dinheiro estava no papo. Mas ao dividir os lucros, Val cometeu três erros: levou o dinheiro e a mulher de Porter, e tentou acabar com a vida do parceiro. Agora, Porter quer o dinheiro de volta e não interessa como o consegue. E não vai parar enquanto não tiver a sua vingança.

programme.title: Martin e Lewis
programme.desc: A história da relação conturbada de 10 anos entre Dean Martin e Jerry Lewis.

programme.title: Mar de Chamas
programme.desc: Dois irmãos bombeiros, que não gostam um do outro, vão ter que trabalhar juntos para apanhar um incendiário criminoso.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos
programme.desc: Uma aluna do liceu suspeita que os assassinatos do Campus estão relacionados com Lendas Urbanas.

programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: A Decisão Mortal
programme.desc: Anna e Tom querem começar uma família, mas vivem dificuldades económicas. Até ao dia em que descobrem o seu inquilino morto e um saco cheio de dinheiro em casa dele. Ao guardar segredo e ficar com o dinheiro, o casal torna-se um alvo a abater.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: De visita a Atenas, o casal Chester e Colette faz amizade com um guia local. Mas, quando este faz uma visita, vê-se forçado a esconder o corpo inconsciente de um homem que supostamente terá atacado o casal. O trio acaba envolvido num crime do qual não pode mais fugir.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: Alta Golpada
programme.desc: Josh Kovacs gere um dos mais sumptuosos e protegidos edifícios de Nova Iorque. Quando Arthur Shaw, o magnata da Wall Street que habita a "penthouse", é mantido em prisão domiciliária, acusado de roubar mais de dois milhões de dólares, Josh e os empregados do prédio entram em pânico.

programme.title: Soldado Destino
programme.desc: Antes de John McCain ser candidato à presidência dos EUA, pilotou bombardeiros no Vietname. Após o seu avião ser atingido, torna-se recluso na célebre prisão conhecida como Hanoi Hilton. Durante anos, ele passa por um inferno, mas não lhe conseguem roubar a sua honra, a nenhum custo.

programme.title: Vencer o Preconceito
programme.desc: Uma família afro-americana luta contra a pobreza, o racismo e o conflito interno, enquanto tentam ter uma vida melhor.

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sentença de Morte
programme.desc: Hailey Dean sabe que a procuradora Paulina D'Orazio está inocente no homicídio de um homem que em tempos mandou para a prisão, e tem de fazer tudo ao seu alcance para o provar perante o número crescente de provas contra ela.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Crisântemos Para Que Vos Quero
programme.desc: Abby Knight volta à sua cidade natal para abrir uma loja de flores mas, no dia da inauguração, o seu carro sofre um acidente por causa de um criminoso em fuga.

programme.title: Dizem Por Aí...
programme.desc: Sarah Huttinger concordou em casar, mas está apavorada com a ideia. A sua carreira de jornalista estagnou na página de obituário do New York Times. A sua irmã Annie decidiu casar-se com o parceiro de ténis e Sarah vai ter que assistir ao enlace, o que significa passar tempo com a sua família...

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Une Femme Avertie En Vaut Deux
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Uma Noite Com o Presidente
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd é Presidente dos EUA e apaixona-se por uma ecologista de um grupo de pressão, que é uma intrigante política a favor do ambiente. À medida que o romance progride, a popularidade de Andrew começa a cair.

programme.title: Sete Vidas
programme.desc: Atormentado por um segredo, Ben Thomas procura a sua redenção transformando radicalmente a vida de sete desconhecidos que escolheu criteriosamente. A única coisa que estas pessoas têm em comum é que chegaram a um ponto de viragem nas suas vidas e precisam que algo mude.

programme.title: Um Amor do Passado
programme.desc: Uma mulher traída, cujo marido a deixa após 25 anos, regressa ao lago onde se apaixonou pela primeira vez e tem um caso amoroso com o filho do seu primeiro amor.

programme.title: America
programme.desc: Retirado de casa pelas autoridades ainda bebé e vivendo em lares adotivos, com atraso na escola e tendo sofrido abusos sexuais, depois de tentar o suicídio, America é colocado num Centro de Tratamento onde a psiquiatra Dra. Brennan o ajuda a abrir-se sobre o seu passado doloroso.

programme.title: A Outra Bolena
programme.desc: As duas irmãs Bolena são incitadas pelo pai a reforçar a posição social da família, pela conquista de favores do rei de Inglaterra. Inicialmente, Mary torna-se amante do rei e tem um filho ilegítimo. Mas Anne consegue afastar tanto a irmã como a mulher do rei, com um único objetivo: ser rainha.

programme.title: Ligações Perigosas
programme.desc: Na França libertina do século XVIII, a Marquesa de Morteuil desafia o seu ex-amante, o Visconde de Valmont, a seduzir Madame de Tourvel, uma bela mulher, casada e temente a Deus. Ambos iniciam assim um perigoso jogo de seduções e enganos.

programme.title: A Luz Entre Oceanos
programme.desc: O casal Tom e Isabel vive feliz numa ilha na costa da Austrália, após a Primeira Guerra Mundial. O maior desejo deles é trazerem uma criança ao mundo, mas, após Isabel abortar, perdem a esperança. Certo dia, o casal resgata uma menina que deu à costa num barco e decidem adotá-la como sua filha.

programme.title: Amor, Estúpido e Louco
programme.desc: Cal Weaver acha que tem o casamento perfeito até que Emily lhe pede o divórcio. Cal, agora solteiro, parte em busca do amor com a ajuda do perito em mulheres Jacob Palmer. Entre paixonetas e encontros, Cal e Jacob percebem que sem a pessoa certa o amor não é só estúpido e louco, é também impossível!

programme.title: Maridos e Mulheres
programme.desc: Gabe e Judy estão chocados com a separação dos melhores amigos. Mas esta situação faz com que eles se questionem sobre o seu relacionamento. Enquanto Gabe pensa em namoriscar uma das suas alunas, o outro casal descobre que a vida de solteiro não é assim tão boa e pensa dar nova vida ao casamento.

programme.title: Rambo - A Fúria do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano da Guerra do Vietname, é preso injustamente por Teasle, mas consegue fugir e dá início a um confronto não só contra o xerife, mas contra toda uma cidade.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Onda de Crimes
programme.desc: Leyre pensa que a sua vida não pode piorar depois de o marido a ter trocado pela melhor amiga e ser despejada de casa. Mas é quando ele é assassinado e ela se torna a principal suspeita, que percebe que as aventuras e peripécias ainda mal começaram.

programme.title: Fintar o Destino
programme.desc: Mané foi um futebolista famoso em Cabo Verde mas perdeu a oportunidade de sair da sua terra para ir jogar para o Benfica e nunca conseguiu ultrapassar a sensação de frustração e oportunidade perdida. Agora, aos 50 anos, vai tentar o impossível e parte para Lisboa.

programme.title: Iris
programme.desc: A vida da brilhante escritora inglesa Iris Murdoch e a sua 'imersão' na doença de Alzheimer. A sua história desde que se casou com o inteletual John Bayley até à sua morte.

programme.title: O Pequeno Vampiro (V.P.)
programme.desc: Rudolph é um vampiro cujo clã é ameaçado por um caçador de vampiros. Ele conhece Tony, um humano fascinado por vampiros, que o ajuda nesta batalha cheia de aventura e algumas dentadinhas! Juntos salvam a família de Rudolph e criam uma grande amizade.

programme.title: Capitão Cuecas - O Filme (V.P.)
programme.desc: George e Harold passam os dias a criar histórias de banda desenhada e a sonhar com partidas. Um dia hipnotizam, acidentalmente, o diretor da escola, levando-o a acreditar que é o Capitão Cuecas, um super-herói completamente tolo, vestido apenas de cuecas e capa.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens intergaláticos interpretam imagens de videojogos clássicos como declarações de guerra e a Terra é atacada. Agora, cabe a um ex-campeão de jogos da década de 80 liderar uma equipa de jogadores da velha guarda, derrotar os aliens e salvar o planeta.

programme.title: Cosmoball - Os Jogadores da Galáxia
programme.desc: Uma enorme nave espacial ergue-se acima da Terra – é uma espécie de estádio para um jogo vagamente parecido com o futebol moderno, mas a velocidades incrivelmente altas. Este é um jogo de bola espacial e quando o jogo começa, o mundo para para ver.

programme.title: A Legião dos Duros
programme.desc: Em Marselha, em 1925, Alain é um pugilista que é contratado por um mafioso para perder um combate. Quando não cumpre o acordado, vê-se forçado a fugir e acaba por se alistar na Legião Estrangeira e ser enviado para combater em Marrocos.

programme.title: O Turista
programme.desc: Frank, um pacato norte-americano de férias em Veneza, conhece Elise, uma mulher que esconde um misterioso segredo. A sua relação rapidamente se transforma numa complicada teia de perigos e enganos, quando se veem perseguidos pela Interpol, pela polícia italiana e por assassinos russos.

programme.title: Amar... é Complicado!
programme.desc: Aos 50 anos, Jane sente que atingiu a estabilidade: os filhos cresceram, o negócio corre bem e superou o trauma do divórcio. Já a vida do ex-marido, Jake, está uma confusão. Mas, num encontro casual, o ex-casal redescobre a paixão. E o inesperado acontece: Jane transforma-se na amante do ex-marido.

programme.title: Rambo - A Fúria do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano da Guerra do Vietname, é preso injustamente por Teasle, mas consegue fugir e dá início a um confronto não só contra o xerife, mas contra toda uma cidade.

programme.title: Rambo: A Vingança do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano do Vietname, regressa à selva para descobrir prisioneiros americanos, mas é atraiçoado pelo comando da operação e terá de escapar à sua maneira.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: O coronel Trautman é feito prisioneiro pelas tropas soviéticas no Afeganistão. Em seu auxílio é enviado o único homem capaz de levar a missão até ao fim: Rambo.

programme.title: O Espectro de Sharon Tate
programme.desc: Aos 26 anos, Sharon Tate é uma estrela em ascensão em Hollywood, que está prestes a dar à luz o seu primeiro filho, do realizador Roman Polanski. Atormentada por terríveis visões, os seus piores pesadelos tornar-se-ão realidade com a entrada em cena de Charles Manson e do seu culto mortal.

programme.title: Não Pare na Pista: A Melhor História de Paulo Coelho
programme.desc: Com base em depoimentos do próprio Paulo Coelho, o filme conta a história dos momentos mais marcantes da vida do escritor, como os traumas, a relação com as drogas e a religião, a sexualidade e a parceria com o músico Raul Seixas.

programme.title: Capitão Cuecas - O Filme (V.P.)
programme.desc: George e Harold passam os dias a criar histórias de banda desenhada e a sonhar com partidas. Um dia hipnotizam, acidentalmente, o diretor da escola, levando-o a acreditar que é o Capitão Cuecas, um super-herói completamente tolo, vestido apenas de cuecas e capa.

programme.title: Amar... é Complicado!
programme.desc: Aos 50 anos, Jane sente que atingiu a estabilidade: os filhos cresceram, o negócio corre bem e superou o trauma do divórcio. Já a vida do ex-marido, Jake, está uma confusão. Mas, num encontro casual, o ex-casal redescobre a paixão. E o inesperado acontece: Jane transforma-se na amante do ex-marido.

programme.title: O Gang dos Tubarões (V.O.)
programme.desc: Oscar, um pequeno peixe muito falador e muito sonhador, tem sonhos de grandeza tão grandes que acabam por lhe trazer também enormes problemas! Já Lenny é um tubarão com um grande segredo: é vegetariano. Certo dia, uma mentira transforma Oscar num herói e a verdade sobre Lenny é revelada.

programme.title: A Força da Verdade
programme.desc: Bennet Omalu é um neuropatologista forense que, ao autopsiar Mike Webster, descobre que a morte se deveu a um trauma cerebral ocorrido anos antes. O homem trava uma luta contra a NFL, para que sejam reconhecidos os elevados riscos cerebrais a que os jogadores de futebol americano estão sujeitos.

programme.title: Hitch - A Cura para o Homem Comum
programme.desc: Em Nova Iorque, Alex Hitchens, um popular médico do coração e das conquistas amorosas, já ajudou inúmeros homens a conquistar a mulher dos seus sonhos. Enquanto treina Albert, um tímido contabilista apaixonado pela sedutora Allegra, Hitch encontra finalmente uma mulher à sua altura.

programme.title: Duro de Matar
programme.desc: Em 2002, a Autoridade Penal da Califórnia reabre a prisão mais famosa da história: Alcatraz. Um funcionário prisional, contrariado, organiza um comando para que se infiltre na reformada fortaleza de alta tecnologia e obrigue um preso a revelar o paradeiro de duzentos milhões de dólares.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Quando a sua lealdade é posta em causa, Salt foge e utiliza as suas aptidões e anos de experiência como agente secreta, de modo a não ser capturada. À medida que Salt faz de tudo para provar a sua inocência, mais dúvidas se levantam, continuando assim a busca pela sua verdadeira identidade.

programme.title: Rambo: A Vingança do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano do Vietname, regressa à selva para descobrir prisioneiros americanos, mas é atraiçoado pelo comando da operação e terá de escapar à sua maneira.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: O coronel Trautman é feito prisioneiro pelas tropas soviéticas no Afeganistão. Em seu auxílio é enviado o único homem capaz de levar a missão até ao fim: Rambo.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: Um músico, "o mariachi", quer vingar a morte da sua namorada e a mutilação de uma das suas mãos. Para isso, regressa à cidade onde tudo aconteceu. Ali, conhece uma bela mulher que trabalha para um dos distribuidores de droga locais, vendo-se de novo envolvido num sangrento confronto.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: Scorpion
Scorpion
programme.desc:
Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. I would recommend seeing a doctor about removing the sticks from your butts.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-22","keywords":"homeland security,outcast,misfit,nerd,brilliant mind","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1175468/","name":"Elyes Gabel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897713/","name":"Katharine McPhee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858776/","name":"Eddie Kaye Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1238801/","name":"Nick Santora"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2548022553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby"}}</script><metacontent="

You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E.
